name: Swarm: True Sting
description: Mature True Sting. Sir Duroy, a member of the Intelligentsia Guild, explored the starry seas and authored the thirty-volume of the *Chronicles of Interdimensional Insects*. The book provides detailed records of over a dozen confirmed species of lepisma and countless subspecies spanning across the stars.

skills.name: Time to Battle
skills.description: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict 2 stacks of Wind Shear.

skills.name: War Gear
skills.description: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single target. If the target is currently suffering from Wind Shear, Wind Shear immediately causes DMG 1 time.

skills.name: Cyclonic Swarm
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG to all targets, with a high chance to cause Wind Shear.

skills.name: Ready Order
skills.description: Enters the Charging state. Uses Swarm Onslaught for the next action.

skills.name: Swarm Onslaught
skills.description: Dispels all Crowd Control debuffs and Weakness Breaks affecting True Stings. Deals Wind DMG to the target, and causes the target to have a high chance of being inflicted with 1 stack of Wind Shear every time they get attacked.

skills.name: Swarm Onslaught
skills.description: Dispels all Crowd Control debuffs and Weakness Breaks affecting True Stings. Deals Wind DMG to the target, and causes the target to have a high chance of being inflicted with 1 stack of Wind Shear every time they get attacked.

skills.name: Transmission Pheromone
skills.description: For every True Stings spawned on the field, all True Stings gain 1 stack of DMG Boost. Only 1 Transmission Pheromone can take effect in battle at a time.

skills.name: Entomon Eulogy
skills.description: When receiving a killing blow, deals Wind DMG to all friendly units, with a high chance to slightly increase their DMG received.
